critique: The president is conveying sadness for the soldiers who fell during the rebellion. The president is also conveying joy for the opportunity to participate in the decoration of the graves of the soldiers. The president is not conveying anger, fear, disgust, or surprise.The intensity of sadness is 7 because the president is directing the departments to close in order to enable the employees to participate in the decoration of the graves of the soldiers.The intensity of joy is 5 because the president is directing the departments to close in order to enable the employees to participate in the decoration of the graves of the soldiers.The intensity of anger, fear, disgust, and surprise is 1 because the president is not conveying these emotions.
